chapters.title: Chapter 1: Seeds of Shadow
chapters.info: Luthair Paendrag Mondwhin, p. 49 (33)—Son of Artur Hawkwing who led forces across the Aryth Ocean. When they landed there, he led them to conquer the continent they found for themselves, and declared himself Emperor. His descendants are the Seanchan “of the Blood,” and the rest of the Seanchan are descended from his troops and the native inhabitants. See also Empress (of Seanchan), The; Paendrag Tanreall, Artur.
